extension.description: Plays a theme file when browsing the root of TV or Movie libraries. File must have theme in the name. Notes: multiple theme files in the same folder will probably break it. Volume is currently janked a bit. TV Melodies willl currently set the volume to the volume listed in the addon setting as an absolute % and reset the volume to max when done playing (fine for me, I use an amp, but a bug that should be fixed someday)
